mapper.select: select rownum as num , temp_board.* from( SELECT seq_no, service_type, title, contents, read_count, usr_ip, del_at, reg_user, reg_dt, upd_user, upd_dt FROM tb_com_board where del_at in ('N') order by upd_dt desc )temp_board
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_com_board ( seq_no, service_type, title, contents, read_count, usr_ip, del_at, reg_user, reg_dt, upd_user, upd_dt ) VALUES ( SEQ_TB_COM_BOARD.nextval, #{serviceType}, #{title}, #{contents}, 0, #{usrIp}, 'N', #{regUser}, sysdate, #{regUser}, sysdate )
mapper.select: SELECT seq_no, service_type, title, contents, read_count, usr_ip, del_at, reg_user, reg_dt, upd_user, upd_dt FROM tb_com_board where seq_no = #{seqNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_com_board SET read_count = read_count + 1 WHERE seq_no = #{seqNo}
UPDATE tb_com_board SET service_type = #{serviceType}, title = #{title}, contents = #{contents}, upd_user = #{updUser}, upd_dt = sysdate WHERE seq_no = #{seqNo}
